description: USDA soil textural classes derived from clay, silt and sand maps. - Resolution: 500m - Geographical Coverage: Alpine space - Input data: LUCAS 2009 Topsoil- Model: Multivariate Additive Regression Splines (MARS) - Year: 2015- Soil texture is classified into 12 classes: 1: Clay, 2: Silty-Clay, 3: Silty Clay-Loam, 4: Sandy Clay, 5: Sandy Clay-Loam, 6: Clay-Loam, 7: Silt, 8: Silt-Loam, 9: Loam, 10: Sand, 11: Loam Sand, 12: Sandy Loam. For further information visit the website European soil data centre (ESDAC).
title: Factor soil texture
